bioconda.name: bioconductor-lbe
bioconda.summary: Estimation of the false discovery rate

biotools.summary: Efficient procedure for estimating the proportion of true null hypotheses, the false discovery rate (and so the q-values) in the framework of estimating procedures based on the marginal distribution of the p-values without assumption for the alternative hypothesis.

bioschemas.name: LBE
bioschemas.summary: Efficient procedure for estimating the proportion of true null hypotheses, the false discovery rate (and so the q-values) in the framework of estimating procedures based on the marginal distribution of the p-values without assumption for the alternative hypothesis.
